rsa-haskell-0.1.0.0: RSA encoding and decoding aplication with key generator.

rsa-haskell-0.1.0.0: RSA encoding and decoding aplication with key generator.

Simple application to encoding, decoding RSA cipher, with key generator.

Modules

  • ArgumentParser Module provides service for input arguments. It is main function.
  • FileManager Module provides file service
  • Keys Module is a wrapper for all RSA Key generating functions.
  • MillerRabin Module is a wrapper for all functions required for proper MillerRabin primality test.
  • RSA Module provides encryption and decryption of text in RSA cryptosystgem

Produced by Haddock version 2.16.1
